title.rendered: Sales Executive ( Chat Based ) Night Shift

content.rendered:
Welcome to Our Night Shift Sales Executive Team: At Quixotic Creatives, we are thrilled to welcome ambitious and dynamic individuals like you to be part of our night shift sales executive team. As a Sales Executive (Chat-Based) on the night shift, you will be at the forefront of our customer interactions, driving sales, and providing top-notch service.

What You’ll Do:

  1. 1. Engage with potential customers through chat-based platforms to understand their needs and recommend the best solutions.
  2. 2. Proactively reach out to prospects, nurturing leads, and converting them into loyal customers.
  3. 3. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to optimize the sales funnel and achieve revenue targets.
  4. 4. Provide exceptional customer service, handling inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring a seamless sales process.
  5. 5. Embrace a customer-centric approach, ensuring that every interaction leaves a positive impact.

Requirements

  1. 1. Proven experience in sales or customer service, with a track record of meeting or exceeding targets.
  2. 2. Excellent written communication skills to engage effectively with customers through chat-based platforms.
  3. 3. Quick thinking and problem-solving abilities to address customer inquiries and objections in real time.
  4. 4. Enthusiastic and self-motivated, with the ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
  5. 5. Comfortable working in a night shift role, with the dedication to deliver outstanding results.
  6. 6. A high school diploma or equivalent qualification is required, and a degree in Sales, Marketing, or a related field is advantageous.

Join Our Vibrant Sales Team:

If you are a persuasive communicator and have a passion for sales and providing top-notch customer experiences, we invite you to join our night-shift sales executive team. Be part of a company that values growth, rewards dedication, and empowers you to unlock your full sales potential. Take the leap and apply now to embark on an exciting journey with us!
